# sakura_cloudhsm_client (Data Source)

Get information about an existing CloudHSM Client.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_cloudhsm" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}

data "sakura_cloudhsm_peer" "foobar" {
  id = "peer-resource-id" # This ID is same as local-router ID used in peer
  cloudhsm_id = data.sakura_cloudhsm.foobar.id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `cloudhsm_id` (String) The ID of the CloudHSM to associate with the client

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the CloudHSM Client.
- `name` (String) The name of the CloudHSM Client.

### Read-Only

- `availability` (String) The availability status of the CloudHSM Client
- `certificate` (String) The certificate for the CloudHSM Client
- `created_at` (String) The creation date of the CloudHSM Client
- `modified_at` (String) The modification date of the CloudHSM Client
